TopicTitle: Move your Vessel from one orbit to another :) ( Mess with savegame persistent.sfs )

Articles.Content:
Purpose: Change the Planet you are orbiting:

Move your Vessel ( Mess with savegame )

1. Bring your Ship into an circular orbit

2. go back to the mainmenu, be sure not to stop your flight

3. open your saves\default (or whatever your savegame is titled)\persistent.sfs with notepad++

4. STRG+F search for your Vesselname

5. scroll a little bit down to ORBIT and find the line "REF = 1"

1 is = Kerbin

for example change it to "REF = 6" and save

6. back to KSP open your savegame, choose your flight, voila. Orbit around Duna.

did this as a quick hack for my son.

---- persistence.sfs ---

VESSEL

{

....

name = TD_Intrepid_CargoExample

....

ORBIT

{

....

REF = 1

...

}

a few REF Codes:

1 Kerbin

2 Mun

3 Minmus

4 Moho

5 Eve - crash

6 Duna - atmo

7 Ike

8 Jool gross

9 Laythe

10 Vall

11 Bop small
